pullrequest.title: Slimmed down the Plugin pull request (no more template specializations)

content.raw: Yeah, I'll be reluctantly removing everywhere. From a user perspective, it should be possible for the specialization to be totally opaque, so they shouldn't have to do any logic based on what kind of specializations their plugin has, making this function entirely unnecessary if we are not using it under the hood anymore.
content.html: Yeah, I'll be reluctantly removing everywhere. From a user perspective, it should be possible for the specialization to be totally opaque, so they shouldn't have to do any logic based on what kind of specializations their plugin has, making this function entirely unnecessary if we are not using it under the hood anymore.
